mapper.select: SELECT u.username,r.recordMoney FROM (SELECT t_record.uid,SUM(t_record.recordMoney) recordMoney FROM t_user,t_record WHERE t_user.userId = t_record.uid GROUP BY t_record.uid) r,t_user u WHERE r.uid = u.userId ORDER BY r.recordMoney DESC LIMIT 0,10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_record (recordMoney,uid,irecordTime,investType,recordStatus) VALUES (#{recordMoney},#{uid},#{irecordTime},'手动投资','成功')
mapper.select: SELECT surplusMoney FROM t_invest WHERE investId = #{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_invest SET surplusMoney = surplusMoney + #{money} WHERE investId = #{uid}
